Classic.name: Alexstrasza
Classic.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
Classic.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

Classic.name: Cenarius
Classic.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
Classic.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

Classic.name: King Krush
Classic.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

Classic.name: Lord Jaraxxus
Classic.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
Classic.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

Classic.name: Malygos
Classic.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

Classic.name: Nozdormu
Classic.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
Classic.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

Classic.name: Onyxia
Classic.text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
Classic.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

Classic.name: Ysera
Classic.text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
Classic.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mal'Ganis
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tree of Life
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Restore all characters to full Health.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Majordomo Executus
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros, the Firelord.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Nefarian
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Volcanic Lumberer
Blackrock Mountain.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

The Grand Tournament.name: Anub'arak
The Grand Tournament.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

The Grand Tournament.name: Aviana
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

The Grand Tournament.name: Icehowl
The Grand Tournament.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

The Grand Tournament.name: North Sea Kraken
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

The League of Explorers.name: Arch-Thief Rafaam
The League of Explorers.flavor: He's very good at retrieving artifacts.  From other people's museums.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Blade of C'Thun
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to_your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Blood of The Ancient One
Whispers of the Old Gods.text:
If you control two of these
at the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Soggoth the Slitherer
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

Tavern Brawl.name: Noth the Plaguebringer
Tavern Brawl.text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a 1/1 Skeleton and give your other minions +1/+1.

Credits.name: Rob Pardo
Credits.text: You can't start a game without this minion in your deck.

System.name: Placeholder Card
System.text: Battlecry: Someone remembers to publish this card.
